On Sep 26, 2010, at 5:53 PM, raffaele messuti wrote:
> i solved, seems a debian packaging issue
> http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=573742
> (not only openjdk, also sun-jre is affected)
> 
> i've modified JAVACMD in bin/heritrix
> and added -Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true 

to be precise, is not even a packaging issue
is net.ipv6.bindv6only = 1
enabled in /etc/sysctl.d/bindv6only.conf

without modifying the starter script, you could set that to 0

ciao

--
